Ingredients.5: 1 (14.1 ounce) package double-crust pie pastry, thawed

Ingredients.6: 6 medium tart apples - peeled, cored and sliced

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Place a baking sheet on an oven rack.

Directions.2: Stir sugar, flour, and cinnamon together in a small bowl until well combined. Cut butter into small pieces; divide into two equal piles.

Directions.3: Roll out pastry to an 11- or 12-inch circle; press into a 9-inch pie pan. Roll out top crust and set aside.

Directions.4: Place sliced apples into a large bowl. Pour sugar mixture over top and add 1/2 of the butter pieces. Toss apples until thoroughly coated. Pour into the pastry-lined pie pan.

Directions.5: Dot apples with remaining butter. Place second pastry on top. Seal edges and cut steam vents in top crust.

Directions.6: Set pie on the baking sheet in the preheated oven. Bake until filling is bubbly and crust is golden brown, 50 minutes to 1 hour.
